mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TERMS_MASTER(term_cate, term_title, term_reg_dy) VALUES(#{termCate}, #{termTitle}, #{termRegDy})

INSERT INTO TB_TERMS_HIST( thist_term_cate, thist_term_order, thist_content, thist_version, thist_ver_memo, thist_admin_id, thist_reg_dy ) VALUES( #{thistTermCate}, #{thistTermOrder}, #{thistContent}, #{thistVersion}, #{thistVerMemo}, #{thistAdminId}, #{thistRegDy} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.term_cate, m.term_order, m.term_title, m.term_reg_dy, (SELECT MAX(h.thist_version) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h WHERE h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order) AS latestVersion, (SELECT MAX(h.thist_reg_dy) FROM TB_TERMS_HIST h WHERE h.thist_term_cate = m.term_cate AND h.thist_term_order = m.term_order) AS latestRegDy FROM TB_TERMS_MASTER m ORDER BY m.term_cate, m.term_order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TERMS_AGREE_HIST( agree_cust_code, agree_term_order, agree_term_cate, agree_yn, agree_dt ) VALUES( #{agreeCustCode}, #{agreeTermOrder}, #{agreeTermCate}, 'Y', SYSDATE )
